attributes.title: Crashed my phone
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to try and see why I should vote for this man again. And it completely crashed my phone. It put a virus on my phone and I had to go and get it fixed! Please don’t download this app and remove it!

attributes.title: It’s pointless
attributes.review: There are very few words to describe this app, unnecessary is one of them. Some more are low-quality, aggravating, and hard. This app has my rating of one star. I apologize to those who downloaded it. To then waste their time.

attributes.title: Do not download please
attributes.review: Ok so I downloaded this app to support our amazing racist president! But it took like a week to download when it downloaded I went on to support our pedo- haha I mean president okay but fr I ain’t supporting a sexist racist and homophobe. Sure I’m white but that don’t mean I have to support you😔please do not download

attributes.title: worse app ever !!!
attributes.review: i do NOT recommend you downloading this app. it took weeks to download and made my phone glitch so much. i mean, i just wanted to learn about my president but it kept kicking me out of the app. this app is horrible and i do NOT recommend downloading it.

attributes.title: Racist
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hope of voting for trump but instead I was met with “Go back to your Country “ in the front page!! Excuse me?? Only because I’m a Mexican trump supporter?? I will be calling the manager and make sure  they get fired right after I get my fajitas with shredded cheese!! This is unacceptable

attributes.title: Do not use Trump 2020
attributes.review: This app is horrible it gives you false information please do not use it. Using this app will give you apps to write a review about and if you give it a high review the review will go in as a low review and if you give it a low review the review will go in as a high review.

attributes.title: ✨🧚🏻🥰❤️for your safety don’t download✨✨🧚🏻🥰❤️🤗
attributes.review:
My screen went cheetoh 🟠 

I was scared it look like it’s hair was flying broom flakes 😔

After I downloaded the app which took a really long time it was asking me to give it five star which no 🤦🏻‍♀️💅🏻 

It stared glitching so I went to the reviews to see if someone had a problem like me and people said this cheetoh puff president🟠 will come to my house 🏠 which I don’t want no cheetoh puff in my house telling me to give it five stars like no 

✨❤️😍🧚🏻nice try 🧚🏻🥰✨don’t try ever again 💋💖🧚🏻

attributes.title: NEVER again
attributes.review: i will never again download such a disgusting app. right after i downloaded the app i heard banging on my front door and opened it to see an envelope saying to rate the app 5 stars. that night i started having nightmares and in the nightmare the big orange cheeto, sorry i mean trump, KIDNAPPED ME. worst app ever😤

attributes.title: Ewww
attributes.review: When I downloaded this add it took for ever and everything is fine where I live and it wouldn’t let me log in or sign up and when I did it took about like an hour just for me to get into the app I don’t like it and I am going to delete it

attributes.title: Caused Deaths
attributes.review:
Hi everyone, let’s make this clear. Trump doesn’t know what he’s doing. He wants to delete TikTok because my daughter wanted to go to the rally but couldn’t because I made her take her caterpillar for a walk😤. TikTok is her life and you want to take that away? No can do, you aren’t going down without a fight. So here’s some fairy comments.

You snapped💖✨🧚‍♀️🌸 next time make sure it’s your neck

Trump 2020🌟🤩💖🧚‍♀️ but on a gravestone 

You should go on a cruise🌟🤩💖🧚‍♀️ but make sure it’s the titanic

Thanks for coming to my ted talk😚✌️
